summary.span: 為元件的資料欄位屬性提供設計階段型別轉換子 (Type Converter)。

span.span: Provides a design-time type converter for a component's data field properties.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是通常由參考的物件屬性。The class is a object that is typically referenced by the attribute. > [!NOTE] > 您通常不型別轉換子直接存取。You typically do not access a type converter directly. 這個實作適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化屬性上。This implementation of is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a on a property.
